projects.title: UniLife - A Personalized Career Consulting System
projects.subtitle: Undergraduate Final Year Project
projects.authors: Supervised by Prof. Benjamin C.M. Kao
projects.description: Web App designed for university students, including services such as interest discovery by chatting, job position recommendation, and career path planning.

projects.title: CASH Algo Trading Challenge 2023
projects.subtitle: Best Strategy Design Award (1st Rank)
projects.description: A competition focuses on quantitative trading algorithms, requiring participants to design and implement an algorithm for a 2-month real-time simulation of Hong Kong stocks trading.

projects.title: Semantic Reconstruction
projects.subtitle: Summer Research
projects.description: A novel framework that integrates 2D features with RGBD frames and subsequently fuses these 2D features into 3D features to enhance the performance of reconstruction.

projects.title: HKU ROBOMASTER AI Challenge
projects.description: We present a competition-level solution to our robotics operates on a ROS (Robot Operating System)-based codebase. The codebase involves atomic operations on detection, decision, motion planning, etc.
